audio.title: Morning Gratitude
audio.description: Start your day with intentional thankfulness and set a positive tone.
audio.transcript: Welcome to this morning gratitude practice. Find a comfortable position, either sitting or lying down. Close your eyes and take three deep breaths...

audio.title: Midday Reset
audio.description: A quick pause to recenter your focus and release tension.
audio.transcript: Take a moment to pause wherever you are. Notice your breath. You don't need to change it, just observe...

audio.title: Evening Wind Down
audio.description: Release the day's tensions and prepare for restful sleep.
audio.transcript: As this day comes to a close, give yourself permission to let go of everything that happened...

audio.title: Body Scan Relaxation
audio.description: A guided journey through your body to release held tension.
audio.transcript: Begin by bringing your attention to the top of your head. Notice any sensations there...

audio.title: Loving Kindness Meditation
audio.description: Cultivate compassion for yourself and others.
audio.transcript: Find a comfortable seat and close your eyes. Begin by directing love and kindness toward yourself...

video.title: Guided Visualization
video.description: A journey through calming imagery to reduce stress.

video.title: Breath Work Basics
video.description: Foundation techniques for relaxation and stress relief.

video.title: Gentle Yoga for Anxiety
video.description: Calming poses to soothe your nervous system.

video.title: Sleep Meditation Journey
video.description: Drift into peaceful sleep with this guided meditation.
